allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
$content = Get-Content Skills.tsx -Raw
$content = $content -replace ''text-gray-600 animate-pulse'',''text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 animate-pulse''
$content = $content -replace ''mt-2 text-gray-600""'',''mt-2 text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400""''
$content = $content -replace ''bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md p-12'',''bg-white/80 dark:bg-gray-800/80 backdrop-blur-md p-12''
$content = $content -replace ''border border-gray-100""'',''border border-gray-100 dark:border-gray-700""''
$content = $content -replace ''text-gray-600 text-lg'',''text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 text-lg''
$content = $content -replace ''bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md p-6'',''bg-white/80 dark:bg-gray-800/80 backdrop-blur-md p-6''
$content = $content -replace ''text-gray-900"">'',''text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100"">''
$content = $content -replace ''bg-blue-100 text-blue-700'',''bg-blue-100 dark:bg-blue-900/50 text-blue-700 dark:text-blue-300''
$content = $content -replace ''border-t border-gray-200""'',''border-t border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700""''
$content = $content -replace ''text-sm text-gray-600'',''text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400''
$content = $content -replace ''font-semibold text-gray-900'',''font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100''
$content = $content -replace ''bg-white rounded-2xl'',''bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-2xl''
$content = $content -replace ''bg-red-50 border border-red-300 text-red-700'',''bg-red-50 dark:bg-red-900/50 border border-red-300 dark:border-red-700 text-red-700 dark:text-red-300''
$content = $content -replace ''text-gray-700 mb-2'',''text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mb-2''
$content = $content -replace ''border border-gray-300 rounded-lg'',''border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-lg''
$content = $content -replace ''transition-all""'',''transition-all bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100""''
$content = $content -replace ''border-gray-300 rounded-lg text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-50'',''border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-lg text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700''
Set-Content -Path Skills.tsx -Value $content
")

Bash(node -e "const fs=require\(''fs''\); let c=fs.readFileSync\(''frontend/src/pages/Skills.tsx'',''utf8''\); c=c.replace\(/const getFreshnessColor = \\\(freshness\\?: number\\\) => \\{[^}]+\\}/s,''const getFreshnessColor = \(freshness?: number\) => {\\n    if \(!freshness\) return \\''text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400\\'';\\n    if \(freshness > 70\) return \\''text-green-600 dark:text-green-500\\'';\\n    if \(freshness >= 40\) return \\''text-yellow-600 dark:text-yellow-500\\'';\\n    return \\''text-red-600 dark:text-red-500\\'';\\n  }''\); fs.writeFileSync\(''frontend/src/pages/Skills.tsx'',c\); console.log\(''Updated''\);")

Bash('
\\$content = \\$content -replace 'border border-red-300 text-red-600','border border-red-300 dark:border-red-600 text-red-600 dark:text-red-400'
\\$content = \\$content -replace 'hover:bg-red-50""">'',''hover:bg-red-50 dark:hover:bg-red-900/20"""">''
$content = $content -replace ''bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow'',''bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 p-4 rounded-lg shadow border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700''
$content = $content -replace ''text-sm text-gray-600'',''text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400''
$content = $content -replace ''text-2xl font-bold text-text'',''text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100''
$content = $content -replace ''bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow'',''bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 p-6 rounded-lg shadow border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700''
$content = $content -replace ''text-xl font-semibold text-text'',''text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100''
$content = $content -replace ''text-accent text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-600'',''text-white bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 dark:bg-blue-500 dark:hover:bg-blue-600 rounded-md''
$content = $content -replace ''text-center text-gray-600 py-8'',''text-center text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 py-8''
$content = $content -replace ''border-green-500 bg-green-50'',''border-green-500 bg-green-50 dark:bg-green-900/20''
$content = $content -replace ''border-blue-500 bg-blue-50'',''border-blue-500 bg-blue-50 dark:bg-blue-900/20''
$content = $content -replace ''font-semibold text-text'',''font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100''
$content = $content -replace ''text-sm text-gray-700 mt-2'',''text-sm text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mt-2''
$content = $content -replace ''text-xs text-gray-600 mt-1'',''text-xs text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 mt-1''
$content = $content -replace ''bg-white rounded-lg p-6'',''bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg p-6 border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700''
$content = $content -replace ''bg-red-50 border border-red-200 text-red-700'',''bg-red-50 dark:bg-red-900/50 border border-red-200 dark:border-red-700 text-red-700 dark:text-red-300''
$content = $content -replace ''text-sm font-medium text-text mb-1'',''text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 mb-1''
$content = $content -replace ''border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-accent focus:border-accent'',''border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100''
$content = $content -replace ''border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-text hover:bg-gray-50'',''border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-md text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 hover:bg-gray-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700''
Set-Content -Path SkillDetail.tsx -Value $content
")

Bash([/border border-red-300 text-red-600 rounded-md hover:bg-red-50/g, 'border border-red-300 dark:border-red-600 text-red-600 dark:text-red-400 rounded-md hover:bg-red-50 dark:hover:bg-red-900/20'],)
Bash([/bg-white p-4 rounded-lg shadow/g, 'bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 p-4 rounded-lg shadow border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700'],)

Bash([/h3 className="""text-sm text-gray-600""/g, ''h3 className="""text-sm text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400""'],
  [/p className=\\""""text-2xl font-bold text-text\\""/g, 'p className="""text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100""''],
  [/className="""bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow""/g, 'className=\\""""bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 p-6 rounded-lg shadow border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700\\""'],)

Bash([/h2 className="""text-xl font-semibold text-text/g, ''h2 className="""text-xl font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100'],
  [/bg-accent text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-600/g, 'bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 dark:bg-blue-500 dark:hover:bg-blue-600'],
  [/text-center text-gray-600 py-8/g, 'text-center text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 py-8'],
  [/border-green-500 bg-green-50/g, 'border-green-500 bg-green-50 dark:bg-green-900/20'],
  [/border-blue-500 bg-blue-50/g, 'border-blue-500 bg-blue-50 dark:bg-blue-900/20'],
  [/font-semibold text-text/g, 'font-semibold text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100'],
  [/className=\\""""text-sm text-gray-700 mt-2\\""/g, 'className="""text-sm text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300 mt-2""''],
  [/className="""text-xs text-gray-600 mt-1""/g, 'className=\\""""text-xs text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400 mt-1\\""'],)

Bash([/className="""bg-white rounded-lg p-6/g, ''className="""bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg p-6 border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700'],
  [/bg-red-50 border border-red-200 text-red-700/g, 'bg-red-50 dark:bg-red-900/50 border border-red-200 dark:border-red-700 text-red-700 dark:text-red-300'],
  [/className=\\""""block text-sm font-medium text-text mb-1\\""/g, 'className="""block text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100 mb-1""''],
  [/className="""w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-accent focus:border-accent""/g, 'className=\\""""w-full px-3 py-2 border border-gray-300 dark:border-gray-600 rounded-md focus:outline-none focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent bg-white dark:bg-gray-700 text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100\\""'],)
Bash(for file in SkillDetail.tsx Analytics.tsx Settings.tsx Landing.tsx Login.tsx Register.tsx)
